siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Perception frustration
frontmatter.description: Brief encounters leave a lasting impression, and negative impressions take time to correct. The correction starts with communicating the right messages. Find ways to communicate the best aspects, change perception with continued thoughtful application.

frontmatter.title: Patient confidence
frontmatter.description: Present the right message, avoid introducing anxiety, and project confidence and progress towards long term goals.

frontmatter.title: Build credibility by showcasing work and demonstrating value
frontmatter.description: Communicate clearly to help others put themselves in the story.
